script.code:
/* Report wrapper for deleting configurations * * * HTTP post parameters: * configuration {string} : Name of the configuration to be written * * Example: * webMI.data.call("ReportDeleteConfiguration", {name: "myOptionalFolder.MyConfigurationDemo"}, function(e) {}) * */
return call("Report.ConfigurationHandler", {action: "delete", configuration: request.postvalues["configuration"]});
